column4: hi. I have remote access to someone's (non-computer-literate person) xubuntu machine. he claims the machine blacks out immediately after graphical login. does anyone have a clue what the problem might be?
... linux prefers people that have no idea to notbeable to mess things up, see how inteligent linux is ! (JOKE)
get the joke. but I was hoping for something more helpful :)
sorry , only here for comedy relief ;)
